task_name: INF: Design and Implement Terraform Workspaces and VPC Networking
resource_notes: Core infrastructure task requiring deep Terraform and AWS expertise. Single point of failure if assigned resource is blocked.
alternative_approach: Manual setup for dev environment to unblock other teams, but this incurs significant technical debt.
risk_factors: Underestimation of security group complexity, single resource bottleneck.
mitigation_strategy: Prioritize task in Sprint 1. Ensure Tech Lead can act as backup reviewer.

resource_notes: High-complexity security feature. Requires deep understanding of OAuth 2.0 PKCE flow, which may be new to the assigned mid-level developer.
alternative_approach: Use a simpler, less secure auth flow (e.g., Implicit) and create tech debt to fix it later. Not recommended.
risk_factors: RISK-005: Incorrect configuration can block all user-specific features. Skill gap for assigned developer.
mitigation_strategy: Allocate senior developer time for pair programming and intensive code review. Prototype the flow early.

task_name: FE/BE: Implement Sync and Conflict Resolution Logic
resource_notes: Most complex feature. Requires tight FE/BE collaboration and a deep understanding of data consistency models.
alternative_approach: Implement a simpler 'online-only' model and defer offline capabilities to a later release.
risk_factors: RISK-003: High risk of data loss due to faulty conflict resolution logic or clock skew issues.
mitigation_strategy: Use server-authoritative timestamps. Implement a 409 Conflict handling flow on the client. Extensive E2E testing is mandatory.
